Verses: 1 ippodhu Kooppidum, Umakku Uththaravu Koduppaar Undo Paarppom? Parisuththavaangalil Yaarai Nokkip Paarppeer?
2 kobam Nirmoodanaik Kollum; Poraamai Buththiyillaadhavanai Adhampannum.
3 nirmoodan Oruvan Veroondrugiradhai Naan Kandu Udane Avan Vaasasthalaththai Sabiththen.
4 avan Pillaigal Ratchippukku Dhooramaagi, Thappuvippaarillaamal, Vaasalile Norukkappattaargal.
5 pasiththavan Avan Vilaichchalai Mutchedigalukkullumirundhu Pariththuth Thindraan; Parigaaran Avan Aasthiyai Vizhunginaan.
6 theengu Puzhudhiyilirundhu Undaagiradhumillai, Varuththam Mannilirundhu Mulaikkiradhumillai.
7 akkinipporigal Mele Parakkiradhupola, Manushan Varuththam Anubavikkap Pirandhirukkiraan.
8 aanaalum Naan Dhevanai Naadi, En Nyaayaththai Dhevanidaththil Oppuvippen.
9 aaraaindhu Mudiyaadha Periya Kaariyangalaiyum, Ennimudiyaadha Adhisayangalaiyum Avar Seygiraar.
10 thaazhndhavargalai Uyaraththil Vaiththu, Dhukkikkiravargalai Ratchiththu Uyarththugiraar.
11 avar Boomiyinmel Mazhaiyai Varushikkappanni, Velinilangalinmel Thanneergalai Varuvikkiraar.
12 thandhirakkaararin Kaigal Kaariyaththai Mudiya Nadaththak Koodaadhapadikku, Avargaludaiya Ubaayangalai Avar Abaththamaakkugiraar.
13 avar Gnaanigalai Avargaludaiya Thandhiraththile Pidikkiraar; Thiriyaavarakkaararin Aalosanai Kavizhkkappadum.
14 avargal Pagarkaalaththile Andhagaaraththukkullaagi, Maththiyaanavelaiyile Iravil Thadavugiradhupola Thadavith Thirigiraargal.
15 aanaalum Eliyavanai Avargal Vaayilirukkira Pattayaththukkum, Belavaanin Kaikkum Vilakki Ratchikkiraar.
16 adhinaal Thariththiranukku Nambikkai Undu; Theemaiyaanadhu Than Vaayai Moodum.
17 idho, Dhevan Dhandikkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan; Aagaiyaal Sarvavallavarudaiya Sitchaiyai Arpamaaga Ennaadhirum.
18 avar Kaayappaduththik Kaayankattugiraar; Avar Adikkiraar, Avarudaiya Kai Aatrugiradhu.
19 aaru Ikkattugalukku Ummai Neengalaakkuvaar; Ezhaavadhilum Pollaappu Ummaith Thodaadhu.
20 panjakaalaththile Avar Ummai Maranaththukkum, Yuththaththile Pattayaththin Vettukkum Vilakki Meetpaar.
21 naavin Savukkukkum Maraikkappaduveer; Paazhaakkudhal Varumpodhum Bayappadaamaliruppeer.
22 paazhaakkudhalaiyum Panjaththaiyum Paarththu Nagaippeer; Kaattumirugangalukkum Bayappadaamaliruppeer.
23 veliyin Kallugalodum Umakku Udanpadikkaiyirukkum; Veliyin Mirugangalum Ummode Samaadhaanamaayirukkum.
24 ummudaiya Koodaaram Samaadhaanaththodirukkak Kaanbeer; Ummudaiya Vaasasthalaththai Visaarikkumpodhu Kuraivaik Kaanamaatteer.
25 ummudaiya Sandhaanam Perugi, Ummudaiya Sandhadhiyaar Boomiyin Poondugalaippola Iruppaargal Enbadhai Arindhukolveer.
26 dhaaniyam Etrakaalaththile Ambaaraththil Serugiradhupola, Mudhirvayadhile Kallaraiyil Seruveer.
27 idho, Naangal Aaraaindhu Arindhadhu Idhudhaan; Kaariyam Ippadi Irukkiradhu; Idhai Neer Kettu Umakku Nanmaiyundaaga Arindhukollum Endraan.
